title: Constructivist-Based Small Group Reflective Learning Design for Biblical Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational biblical interpretation theory and small-group learning experience
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing reflective thinking through collaborative knowledge building for pre-service teachers. Combining online discussions and offline practical sessions using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can accept diverse interpretations with an open attitude when analyzing biblical texts
Learners can make responsible decisions based on biblical foundations in small-group discussions.
Learners can strengthen personal beliefs while maintaining consistency in biblical interpretation through collaborative learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
